summary: This document is an email exchange between Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd discussing mutual funds and a request for a phone call. It highlights internal communications within Deutsche Bank regarding financial operations.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is reaching out to Lisa Hurd for a phone call.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd works in operations at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is involved in the posting of mutual funds.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 22, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is requesting a phone call with Lisa Hurd.
Lisa Hurd mentions mutual funds that need to be manually posted.
The correspondence is classified as confidential and for internal use only.
